scripts.start: npm run build-libs && npm run build && react-scripts start
scripts.start-dev: npm run build-libs-dev && npm run build && react-scripts start
scripts.build-libs: cd ../tagspaces-md && npm run build && cd ../tagspaces-codemirror && npm run build && cd ../extension-ui && npm run build && cd ../md-sample
scripts.build-libs-dev: cd ../tagspaces-md && npm run build-dev && cd ../tagspaces-codemirror && npm run build && cd ../extension-ui && npm run build-dev && cd ../md-sample
